s1.name: Welcome to the developers' corner
s1.p: JORAM welcomes any kind of contribution: feedback, bug tracking, ideas, suggestions, expectations, and of course, code.
Any feature you need but you do not find implemented in JORAM may become a contribution topic. Simply send your ideas, documents and developments (if any) to the joram team .
The following resources are proposed to the advanced users and developers:

ul.li: The releases description page provides in-depth descriptions of the CVS releases.
The hot topics page lists all the current developement tasks. If you want to join, feel free.
The CVS allows you to get JORAM through CVS, browse the updates, differencies, etc.
